reservations.name: Sunny Beach Resort
reservations.description: A beachfront hotel offering stunning views and great amenities.

transportation.name: Local Car Rental
transportation.description: Convenient car rental service available for exploring the area.

day1.day_description: Arrive in Malibu and relax on the scenic beaches.

activities.title: Zuma Beach
activities.description: Enjoy sunbathing and swimming at one of the most popular beaches.

activities.title: Nobu Malibu
activities.description: Luxury Japanese restaurant overlooking the ocean.

activities.title: Malibu Pier
activities.description: Take a stroll on the historic pier and enjoy the views.

day2.day_description: Explore local attractions and nature trails.

activities.title: Trancas Country Market
activities.description: A charming market with local eateries and shops.

activities.title: El Matador State Beach
activities.description: A beautiful beach known for its scenic cliffs and sea caves.

activities.title: The Old Place
activities.description: Rustic eatery serving hearty American fare in a cozy atmosphere.

activities.title: Point Dume Natural Preserve
activities.description: Hiking trails with breathtaking ocean views.
